name: I WILL BE WITH YOU (WHERE THE LOST ONES GO)
summary: Sarah Brightman Sings the Theme Song to the Anime Feature Film "Pokemon Diamond Pearl Dialga Vs. Palkia Vs Darkrai". Also features Chris Thompson.
